articles.content: AT&T (T) is finally getting aggressive with HBO Max, but the math doesn't really add up. The biggest problem here is the company waited a couple of years following the closure of the Time Warner … [+6688 chars]

articles.author: Ben Kenigsberg
articles.title: Who Wrote ‘Citizen Kane’? It’s No Mystery - The New York Times
articles.description: The Netflix drama “Mank” suggests that Herman J. Mankiewicz, credited along with Orson Welles, primarily wrote the script. But that has long been debunked by scholars.
articles.content: She picks the guy who is the epitome of the auteur in America and tears down his one great achievement that everybody can agree on, said Joseph McBride, who wrote three books on Welles and acted for … [+1901 chars]

articles.author: Faith Karimi, CNN
articles.title: 'The Queen's Gambit' is sparking a surge of interest in chess - CNN
articles.description: David Bradley spends most weekends engaged in intense chess matches with his 15-year-old daughter, Zoe. They stare at the board for hours and plot their next moves, consumed by a new shared pastime.
